item.title: How Donald Trump Lost Control of the Epstein Spin Cycle
item.description: Donald Trump has spent years benefiting from the QAnon's Jeffrey Epstein obsession. That’s all changing.

item.title: Adobe to buy Semrush for $1.9 billion
item.description: Adobe said it would offer $12 per share for Semrush, almost double the latter's closing price of $6.89 on Tuesday, before news of the deal.

item.title: 19 Best Mac Accessories (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: From a Mac Mini hub to mechanical keyboards, these curated gadgets will upgrade your Mac-powered desktop.

item.title: With upcoming ban, Meta begins to notify Australian teens that their accounts will be shut down
item.description: When the ban goes into effect on December 10, Meta will revoke account access for users under the age of 16 in Australia.

item.title: Spotify’s new features let listeners explore the people and stories behind their favorite music
item.description: Spotify new features will showcase who's behind your favorite songs, how music is connected, and what inspired the tunes.
